text:
Preheat the oven to 140ºC. Prepare the cake pan by lining or greasing. Rub the butter in with the sugar. Add the eggs and beat through. Add the flour and the chopped fruits.  Pour half of the cake batter into the prepared cake pan.  Mix the almond paste ingredients together. Roll out a thin layer from some of the paste formed. Place a thin layer of almond paste over the batter.  Pour the second half of the batter over the almond paste layer.  Place in the oven. Cook for 1 and 3/4 hours. Remove from the oven and allow to cool. Use a wire cooling rack. Cover the cake with almond paste. Push in a few sugared almonds. Place under the grill to set for a few minutes. Remove and decorate. Items to decorate with include: Easter eggs, little chick toys, sugared flowers, Easter figures, etc. See the following photos for more ideas:
Marzipan balls and chocolate eggs. Marzipan balls and sugar eggs. Singed marshmallows and little chicks. Marzipan chicks and fish.
